doc.plot: Mary Ann Collura's story is one of a truly amazing person. A person who never took one day of her life for granted. A woman whose selflessness, outgoing personality, and charm radiated upon everyone she crossed paths with. Hearing her story only makes you wish you could have had the chance to know her while she was here. It is a story that needs to be told!
